MainLayout.description: Dynamic web portfolio developed with Next.js and React, designed to showcase projects, skills, and professional experience of a web developer. Implements a modern and optimized architecture for smooth and responsive navigation, with support for dark and light themes, internationalization, and instant static deployment.

HomePage.sectionTitleSubtextEducation: Following books and courses to create efficient web development, powered by my knowledge in industrial engineering and project management, allowing me to take each project from start to finish successfully.
